rule.description: MikroTik system identity changed by $(admin_user) via $(method) from $(srcip) to $(new_identity)
MikroTik system time changed from $(old_time) to $(new_time)
MikroTik time zone changed to $(time_zone) by $(admin_user) via $(method)
VPN user $(username) logged in from $(srcip) with local IP $(localip)
Authentication failed
VPN user $(username) logged out from $(srcip)
Login failure for user $(username) from $(srcip) via $(method)
User $(admin_user) logged in from $(srcip) via $(method)
User $(admin_user) logged out from $(srcip) via $(method)
MikroTik user $(target_user) $(action) by $(admin_user) via $(method) from $(srcip) (group=$(group))
MikroTik user $(target_user) password changed by $(admin_user)
MikroTik firewall rule $(event_action) | action=$(fw_action) | user=$(admin_user) | srcip=$(srcip)$(chain:+ | chain=$(chain))
MikroTik firewall filter rule removed by $(admin_user) via $(method) from $(srcip)
MikroTik IPv6 firewall rule $(event_action) | action=$(fw_action) | user=$(admin_user) | srcip=$(srcip)$(chain:+ | chain=$(chain))
MikroTik IPv6 firewall filter rule removed by $(admin_user) via $(method) from $(srcip)
MikroTik IP service $(changed_service) changed by $(admin_user) via $(method) from $(srcip)
MikroTik DNS configuration changed by $(admin_user) via $(method) - remote-requests:$(allow_remote_requests) servers:$(dns_servers) doh-server:$(doh_server)
MikroTik DNS configuration changed by $(admin_user) via $(method) - remote-requests: $(allow_remote_requests),dns-servers: $(dns_servers),doh-server: $(doh_server)
MikroTik script added by $(admin_user) via $(method) from $(srcip) script name: $(script_name) source code: $(source_code)
MikroTik script removed by $(admin_user) via $(method) from $(srcip)
MikroTik special-login added by $(admin_user) from $(srcip) (target=$(target_user), special_port=$(special_port), disabled=$(disabled))
MikroTik special-login changed by $(admin_user) from $(srcip) (target=$(target_user), special_port=$(special_port), disabled=$(disabled))
MikroTik special-login removed by $(admin_user) from $(srcip)
